data.text:
This image is a public domain image, which means either that copyright has expired in the image or the copyright holder has waived their copyright. Alamy charges you a fee for access to the high resolution copy of the image.

CAMP LEMONNIER, Djibouti - The Camp Lemonnier Post Office is the only U.S. postal facility on the continent of Africa and serves more than 5500 base personnel, the U.S. Embassy in Djibouti, forward-deployed units in the AFRICOM area of operation and U.S. transient assets arriving into the Port of Djibouti. The mission of Camp Lemonnier is to enable joint warfighters operating forward and to reinforce the relationship between the United States and Djibouti by conducting five key shore missions - air operations, port operations, security, safety and quality of life - and providing core mission enablers such as fuel, water and power for tenant commands, transient U.S. assets and individual service members.
